skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I'm quite familiar and good with an array of tools to build stunning and dynamic Front-End website. I know how to use ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, Redux, Bootstrap,TailwindCSS to name a few.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I use tools like NodeJS, ExpressJS, RestFull APIs, fetch etc to build and maintain the backend or server side of your website to ensure your website runs and functions smoothly

skills.title: Database
skills.description: As a MERN Stack developer I'm most familiar with MongoDB to store data for your website, I have however on several occasion used Firebase and I am also getting familiar with SQL like Postgres

portfolio.title: Real Estate Website
portfolio.description: This fullstack real estate website was built with React and Tailwind on frontend and NodeJS, ExpressJS, JWT, Firebase etc for backend while MongoDB to store data.

portfolio.title: Ecommerce Website
portfolio.description: This is the frontend of simple Ecormerce website, buiting using ReactJS, Redux and CSS3 for styling.

portfolio.title: Easy Rent
